BNC User Reference Guide

<persNote>

persNote contains any additional information supplied about a participant in a spoken text.
Class model.persStateLike
Declaration 
element persNote { macro.phraseSeq }
Attributes
(Global attributes only)
Example
 <person ageGroup="X"
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">
  <persNote>May well be an actor portraying a Davidian</persNote>
 </person>
Module module-from-bncxml
